website_summaries.verdict: If affordability and durability are your top concerns, these tennis shoes are worth considering. They also do a good job absorbing shock, even on hard surfaces.
pros: These practical and inexpensive tennis shoes come with features made for the court, including a sturdy toe guard, ADIPRENE®+ insole cushioning, and sturdy ADIWEAR® 6 outsole suitable for hard court surfaces
cons: Some owners gripe that the style isn't very fashionable
Fit is a bit loose for some, especially those with narrow feet

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable But Run Large!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 9 in running shoes and tennis shoes. This model runs a little large so I recommend going down a 1/2 size. The 9 was too big, but the 8 1/2 was perfect. They felt very comfortable on. Have not played in them yet, but the price was fabulous! I just got through wearing the Stella McCartney Adidas and they were double the price of these. They also wore out really fast, and my budget can’t handle that. Four stars due to poor sizing and the hassle of having to return and re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same Adidas Barricade
customer_reviews.text: For tennis the last five years I have worn Adidas Barricade right out of the box. These new Barricades Court don't fit like the old ones. They are narrow and short. Wear the top of the left shoe hit my ankle it was painful.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Kutzner

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my new tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new tennis shoes! They are light weight, comfortable from the first time you wear them and at a great price. They hold my feet perfectly for a better movement while playing. Usually I buy tennis shoes half size larger to give space for the socks.In terms of durability I can't tell yet because I have only used them five or six times on the tennis court.
customer_reviews.author: Moonwalk

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a design flaw that makes them nearly impossible to fit properly. Just looking at them now, I can see that the tongue (which is thicker than usual) sits too far back. As a result, I could barely get my pretty thin feet inside the shoes. Once I did, the shoes were very tight and uncomfortable across the middle. Unless your feet are extremely thin and narrow, I just don’t see how these shoes could work. I bought them in a size 9 and they’re going back.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelyn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE FEET THAT ARENT AS THIN AS PENCILS.
customer_reviews.text: THIS SHOE SUCKS. I am in desperate need for a new pair of tennis shoes, and was excited to have my new pair arrive. when these arrived, they were waaaay too tight. i’m a size 7 or 7.5, so i thought the problem was that they just ran small. but nope! i offers a second pair asap, and they just got here. i ordered them in a 7.5 and it turns out the tongue is EXTREMELY thick and unrealistic. there is no width to the shoe at all- as the sizes go up they just get longer, not wider. ZERO STARS. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED AND ANNOYED.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes and price
customer_reviews.text: I love these tennis shoes, I usually wear adizero but I ordered these for clay court season, a bit less expensive, so I don't mind if they get messed up. I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they are. They are not as light as the adizero but not as heavy as the Stella M barricade. I ordered a 2nd pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The sport shoes fit was excellent. We went to a store and tried on various sizes, but were still concerned if the shoe would run true to its size. It fit wonderfully. They are also easy to keep clean. A little dish soap wipes the court dirt right off.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Keener

customer_reviews.title: Too big and looks very masculine.
customer_reviews.text: Too large! My ankle kept coming up and I ordered the size I usually order when I purchase athletic shoes (7.5). It looked super long and looked like a man's shoe. Ugly.
customer_reviews.author: HellyK

customer_reviews.title: Stayed white through the whole season!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked too big when I pulled them out of the box, but when I put them on they fit perfectly. They also stayed pretty clean through the tennis season, and the material is easy to clean if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing and they are a great tennis court shoe. Highly suggest it!! They are hard to break in at first, but it is completely worth it. The color is a solid, beautiful white. In addition, it gives a great balance to your feet and comfortablity when running around playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: pmelr

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Adidas brand tennis shoes. I usually buy Nike ,but notice they wear out quickly. My instructor told me that Adidas is much better holding up and they are a heavry shoe. They are heavy I noticed when playing and I feel like I have more support. Will purchase another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Tennis
customer_reviews.text: Great court shoes. I play on clay and concrete. Good traction, excellent arch support.
customer_reviews.author: CroRo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty buy WAY TOO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: Ok a lot of people said it, and I thought I would have a different result.. NOPE! These are VERY PRETTY These are also VERY NARROW Why? I have several Adidas tennis shoes WTH happened when they made these? The young of the foot doesn’t even go in this shoe when my foot is in it cuz it’s THAT NARROW. Sadly have to return.
customer_reviews.author: SAlford

customer_reviews.title: Very good tennis shoe!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit narrow in the front but not uncomfortable. Great grip, makes you feel secure on court. They’re really pretty, femenine but not girlie. I always buy half size more and it also worked for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Isa

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Tennis Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have always worn the Adidas tennis shoes. Needed new pair and these fit very will and move with me well on the court! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Blue one is not stable at all  I used the first and second picture for many match
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with my Barricade court tennis shoes which I was purchasing before , but at this time my shoes was not having the same sole and they are very unstable and two times I used them I rolled my ankle which never happened to me before . They are not made for tennis at all , I never going to use them again and planning to give them away.I feel my shoes was fake because I used Barricade before and I can see the difference between this product and my old shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tennis (& trendy too!)
customer_reviews.text: Needed a black shoe for my tennis team “uniform”. So comfortable & light weight, yet supportive. Also, they don’t make my size 9.5 feet look nearly as large as my other court shoes. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Aras

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The edge of the shoe was rough at first and caused a blister on the top of my foot. Seemed to get better after a couple of days. the shoes are nice looking and good for pickleball.
customer_reviews.author: Alice T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lemon yellow-just as in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Nice lemon yellow-just as in the photo. Great quality. Bought it for my daughter for fencing, she says they are comfortable but a bit too springy for her liking.
customer_reviews.author: MadameBlueberry

customer_reviews.title: Great performance!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. It just fit a little tight but the stretch as you wear them. Great performance on court. I’ll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lara A Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: The size is true and it feels good. Wore for the 1st time in my last ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased probably 4 times or more Adidas Barricade. The size is true and it feels good. Wore for the 1st time in my last match. However it doesn't hug my foot with the ankle support like previous Adidas Barricade
customer_reviews.author: Shredmax

customer_reviews.title: Awesome supportive tennis sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome comfy and so pretty! These shoes are so supportive on the court. The colors are beautiful. Very happy with my purchase. I’m not all a 9.5 and they fit perfectly. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mignogna Family

customer_reviews.title: A more traditional shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact this shoe does not have the oversized pronator cap, which causes me to shuffle when I run. thought I would have to give up Adidas altogether, but these are great. whew!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and tennis shoe is very durable for heavy tennis players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me very long
customer_reviews.text: I played two season of both volleyball and tennis in these they are still holding up needless to say they are grey af
customer_reviews.author: Amber Su

customer_reviews.title: it would have been better to use wide
customer_reviews.text: I’m standard size in width... but with these shoes, it would have been better to use wide... the standard size is too small...
customer_reviews.author: KatherineG

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 5 which should've 5 1/2 bcoz it's too narrow but hopefully after breaking it in it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is too hard and very uncomfortable. Forgot to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Love this tennis/basketball sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this tennis/basketball sneaker! It’s supportive for lateral as well as back and forth moving on the court. Comfortable and true to size. Also my backhand killer with these sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Tennis shoe out there! 13 year old loves these....I've bought 3 pair now
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The heel slips, a bit large. I do get compliments on the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Dulude

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and super comfortable (even while breaking into them) I had originally purchased a different style of court shoes from Adidas that were very uncomfortable, so these were a pleasant surprise when they fit nicely (also, the style is nice too!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis Shoes - durable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love the Adidas Barricade Tennis Shoes! Wear well and great for playing tennis in.
customer_reviews.author: Lawbet

customer_reviews.title: tight and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: tight and uncomfortable. Possibly a larger size ie 7.5 would have fit, but there was no 7.5 size available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight. Ran a little large. But it is very hard to fit small feet (size 5) without going into youth sizes. Really didn’t want Hello Kitty on my shoes, 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ive worn these tennis shoes three times to play in, and there is already a small hole wearing in the right shoe. I expected more from Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 8 but these were more like 9 or 9.5. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes is for men, not women
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 and I ordered an 7.5. The shoes feel like 8, which is totally fine for tennis shoes. THE ONLY PROBLEM IS it makes my feet look super big. I am a woman but i feel like wearing a man's shoes, so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: watssuptj

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 9 1/2 they fit super tight and are long
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 they fit super tight and are long. I had to return and order a whole size bigger, put them on and they are killing my feet. Feel super tight in the middle and are now even longer :( I only buy adidas so I'm not really sure what's going on here. However I will have to return the 2nd pair now.
customer_reviews.author: William     june 5 2015

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff at first but getting better with each wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Micki Barber

customer_reviews.title: Discolors easily. White portions on top of show turn yellow
customer_reviews.text: No amount of washing takes the yellow out. I wish I could send them back. I wanted white and got yelow ugly shoes. Never again. I also rolled me ankle twice. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: wendy walker

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: A little too wide and the white changed colors with sweat!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Hamen

customer_reviews.title: EU size is not as indicated in the size chart
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand it. I'm wearing size US 5.5, it is equal to 38 EU on the box I've received it isUS5.5, but 36 EU, and shoes are very small. I HAVE OTHER ADIDAS SHOES. I just cant understand what's going on
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: great court shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased. They are super comfortable and supportive on the court
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Fit is tight but long
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Fit is tight but long. I normally wear a 8 but ordered 7.5. Sturdy for a paddle court and they have good ankle support. Only wore these twice so far but no issues with pain, etc.
customer_reviews.author: hellonicole

customer_reviews.title: Ran a size too large. I had to order a whole size down.
customer_reviews.text: Indoor/outdoor tennis and squash. Toebox is wide, but total depth of shoe is shallow, meaning if you have skinny, non-thick feet, they will work for you. Good heel fit, solid arch support. Stable, fast, responsive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: comfortable from the minute you puy them on.
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. great support for movement in tennis. look good. comfortable out of the box. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mary Foland

customer_reviews.title: Barricades are my go to shoe and I usually never ...
customer_reviews.text: Barricades are my go to shoe and I usually never have a problem with them, but this pair is different. I cant wear them at all. The tongue rubs on the top of my foot at a weird place and it hurts to wear them. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stuffler

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes. I would definitely recommend them and purchase them again
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this shoe.  It is a knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cheap knock off... did not fit and construction of she was not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: michele c. mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for tennis. Fits true to size and very comfortable. Nice price too!
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Tennis
customer_reviews.text: Tennis. Okay but not the best tennis shoe i’ve Had.
customer_reviews.author: antoinette buonafede

customer_reviews.title: ... it showed in the picture and overall they are comfortable and great
customer_reviews.text: The tennis shoes were the same as it showed in the picture and overall they are comfortable and great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are really good. It gives you control
customer_reviews.text: I play tennis with them. They are really good. It gives you control.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Fit way too small. I went upna half size but it was so tight and constricting. Unless you’ve worn this brand for tennis before, I’d go up one full size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are comfortable. I have 8
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are comfortable. I have 8.5 size and have ordered 8.5 size of this tennis shoes and they fit me as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit true to size and are very comfortable. They provide a great support for my arches.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: With two pair of socks they are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They run just a little big. With two pair of socks they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I just took up tennis & these shoes are perfect! Plus, I love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is awesome so many compliments!! Shoes are comfortable right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Torres

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are not sized the same as Adidas Sonic Attack.
customer_reviews.author: Annette E. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit a little hard on bottom of feet for someone who has plantar issues though. not real cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: samira m.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but return was
customer_reviews.text: The size was too big. Nice shoe, but return was vague
customer_reviews.author: Paftty Kewitsch

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are well built. Nevertheless, something is wrong with the cut of the shoes. While otherwise just fitting right (I ordered a half size smaller than usual thanks to other reviewers), the heal is slipping which doesn't give me a good and secure support. Currently I own 8 pairs of sneakers from all kind of brands for different activities, and I don't have those problems with any of them. Therefore, I am sure that the culprit is not my feet.
customer_reviews.author: BW

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Barricade Court Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: Built for unlimited court coverage, these women's tennis shoes feature a breathable mesh upper. Synthetic overlays have been added for extra support, while a 3D torsion midsole helps keep you stable during the most intense rallies. Crafted with a cloudfoam midsole for ultimate comfort.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Synthetic upper for lightweight durability and comfort
Abrasion-resistant Adituff wraps around the toe and medial forefoot to help protect against foot drag that occurs during serves, volleys and extreme lateral movements
Torsion System between the heel and forefoot for stability
Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
Adiwear outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
